title: Head
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The head element represents a collection of metadata for the document, including links to stylesheets, scripts, and more.

usageExamples.title: Adding a Title
usageExamples.description: Add a title to the head section of the document.

usageExamples.title: Linking CSS
usageExamples.description: Link an external CSS file to the head section.
